description:
It`s summer, and Natsumi is lounging at home when the doorbell rings. The visitor is Miyauchi Hikage, who`s returned home from Tokyo for summer break. Hikage says she wants to play something that`ll give her a chance to move around a lot since she just got off the Shinkansen, and Natsumi is eager to join in. She declares that she came up with a new finishing move, the Surefire Kill Shot, while Hikage was away, and decides to show it off...
Source: crunchyroll
